Parent Kimjongilia 16 Years Old
Foreign Ministry Spokesman on DPRK Visit of Japanese FM. Delegation
articles.content:
Parent Kimjongilia 16 Years Old
    Pyongyang, February 14 (KCNA) -- It is 16 years since parent Kimjongilia bloomed in the DPRK amidst world progressives' boundless reverence and best wishes for leader Kim Jong Il.
 A Japanese floriculturist, attracted by Kim Jong Il's personality as a great man, presented him with a potted parent flower in February Juche 77 (1988). Three flowers came into bloom on this pot on the occasion of his birthday this year.    
 This flower can bear buds for more than 15 years. This year, too, there appeared on its strong stem beautiful red flowers, attracting the eyes of visitors.

articles.title: 13th International Figure-Skating Festival for Paektusan Cup Opens
DPRK Ambassador to India Appointed
State Academic Moiseyev Dance Company Arrives
articles.content:
DPRK Ambassador to India Appointed
    Pyongyang, February 14 (KCNA) -- Mun Song Mo was appointed as ambassador e.p. of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea to the Republic of India, according to a decree of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly.

articles.title: U.S. New Operation Plan Denounced
articles.content:
State Academic Moiseyev Dance Company Arrives
    Pyongyang, February 14 (KCNA) -- The State Academic Moiseyev Dance Company headed by Elena Scherbakova, director of the dance company, arrived here today.
  It was greeted by Ji Jae Ryong, vice-department director of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, and officials concerned, Russian Ambassador to the DPRK Andrei Karlov and staff members of the Russian embassy here.
